function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Infodemics and fake news spreading at an unprecedented speed and reach, making it challenging to find trustworthy sources and reliable information.","Impact":"Difficulty in finding reliable information can hamper the effectiveness of pandemic response and guidance for stakeholders and citizens.","Mitigation":"Establishing and promoting trustworthy sources of evidence, educating stakeholders on how to identify reliable information, and monitoring and countering misinformation.","Technologies":"AI-driven fact-checking algorithms, data analytics for monitoring information spread, and digital platforms for verified information dissemination.","People":"Policy-makers, stakeholders, citizens, and media.","Owner":"KT platforms and trusted institutions."},{"Description":"Lack of cross-sectoral dialogue and collaboration, leading to siloed approaches in public health crisis response.","Impact":"Limited coordination and integration of efforts across different sectors, leading to gaps and inefficiencies in the pandemic response.","Mitigation":"Facilitating platforms for cross-sectoral dialogue, promoting collaboration and information sharing among different sectors, and incentivizing integrated approaches to public health crises.","Technologies":"Collaboration software, virtual collaboration platforms, and cross-sectoral data integration tools.","People":"Policy-makers, public health officials, industry leaders, and community representatives.","Owner":"KT platforms, government agencies, and intergovernmental organizations."}]}
